There is no evidence that Dr: Anthony Fauci is personally financially invested in a coronavirus vaccine.
The Gates Foundation has pledged up to: 60 million for COVID-19 vaccine development, not $100 million as claimed.
Dr: Fauci has been cautious about endorsing hydroxychloroquine as a COVID-19 treatment due to lack of conclusive research, not because he stands to earn millions from a vaccine.
The Facebook post falsely connects Bill: philanthropy with Dr. Fauci's public remarks about hydroxychloroquine, creating a misleading narrative.
